thought: The Slack action parameters are missing, causing the workflow execution to fail. I need to provide the correct parameters for sending a text message to the #general channel.
plan: Set 'select' parameter to 'channel' to specify sending to a channel.
Set 'channelId' parameter with mode 'name' and value 'general' to target #general channel.
Set 'messageType' to 'text' for simple text message.
Set 'text' parameter to '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract message text from input data.
Test the Slack message sending after updating parameters.
criticism: Currently, the Slack action has empty params, which leads to workflow execution failure. Providing correct params should fix the issue.

tool_input.comments: Send the generated conversation to Slack #general channel as a text message with correct parameters.
